typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Data_Carrega as string
}
source(output(
		Codi as string,
		Significat as string,
		{10  General intern} as string,
		{11  Bad Code} as string,
		{20  General extern} as string,
		{25  BEG} as string,
		{30  Personal de la biblioteca} as string,
		{110  Instituci贸 interna} as string,
		{120  Instituci贸 externa} as string,
		{  Totals  } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STGFactAltesUsuaris
STGFactAltesUsuaris derive(DATA_INSERCIO = currentDate(),
		PERIODE = toDate(concat($Data_Carrega, '01'),'yyyyMMdd')) ~> Datas
Datas select(mapColumn(
		ID_LOCATION = Codi,
		DESC_BIBLIOTECA = Significat,
		NUM_GENERAL_INTERN = {10  General intern},
		NUM_BAD_CODE = {11  Bad Code},
		NUM_GENERAL_EXTERN = {20  General extern},
		NUM_BEG = {25  BEG},
		NUM_PERSONAL_DE_LA_BIBLIOTECA = {30  Personal de la biblioteca},
		NUM_INSTITUCIO_INTERNA = {110  Instituci贸 interna},
		NUM_INSTITUCIO_EXTERNA = {120  Instituci贸 externa},
		NUM_TOTAL = {  Totals  },
		DATA_INSERCIO,
		DATA_PERIODE = PERIODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenombrarCampos
RenombrarCampos sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> HistFactAltesUsuaris
